snippet.title: Magic awakens on December 15
snippet.description:
Spellz is a medieval rogue-lite where deep mastery of your spells and split-second decisions are essential to survival. Your arduous training will call for dexterity, parrying, dodging and, above all, hundreds upon hundreds of deaths... to unlock a whole range of new spells and runes.

The wishlist is open for the bravest among you: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2671550/Spellz_Mastery_or_Death/

Big things are coming soon, and you're obviously not ready.
